website_summaries.verdict: A rugged kit that stands out for its smaller details, such as the cocktail picks and marked jiggers.
pros: Shaker and other metal elements are constructed from rustproof stainless steel
14-piece kit includes a sizable shaker, mojito muddler, and jiggers with markings
Comes with an online cocktail catalog
cons: Set does not include a fine strainer

customer_reviews.title: In-Home Bartending is this Easy!
customer_reviews.text: This came relatively quick and was able to be gifted on time. Upon follow up they indeed really loved this and will continually use this product! Highly recommend especially for you first time in-home bartending!
customer_reviews.author: James Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kit - initial hiccup but best customer service I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: I initially gave a 1/5 stars review because my lid didn't fit when I got it. Your lid should fit perfectly. I emailed - and I got a response from a co-owner immediately. I'm super impressed with the customer service that this company has. In addition to that - I ordered a replacement and the new set works perfectly. I would buy this again and I'll probably use this as a gift idea for friends. Honestly don't worry about my lid issue - and trust if you have one that they'll fix it for you. I am very pleased with my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this package, their atention to details is impresive!
customer_reviews.author: Christian Ali Kuri Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Freaking awesome gift or Home add on
customer_reviews.text: I love it! With the 3 year warranty included I believe this is a great gift for anyone trying this out! Also since I'm starting bartending school. I brought this along, made me look cooler!
customer_reviews.author: Lexie 💐

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Value!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this kit! I believe it’s got all of the basic tools for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Happy I purchased
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our home bar. We host a lot of friends and business partners. We did not own the tools to make martinis and various mixed drinks. Kit came in on time and was very carefully packed. The quality is far better than expected given the price point and number of included pieces. Highly recommened. It has been a month or so since my purchase, and I have now used this set a several times. Each piece is durable, easy to clean and honestly looks really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for cocktails
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice handy mixology shaker set to have. The set has nice quality to it and is easy to use. It also has everything you need to have to make the cocktails you want. The only problem is it’s hard to fit everything back into the cylinder container after you take it out.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary M.

customer_reviews.title: Easily Portable, and Ready To Go
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint that I could think of, is that putting all of the contents of the kit back into the tube that it comes in, once out, is a bit of a challenge. Other than that, I am very happy with the product. I wasn't entirely sure where to start, and what to get, as I've only recently entered into the world of drinks mixing. The kit comes with everything that you would need to get started. The lifetime warranty, and the coupon code really sealed the deal, I have some friends that could definitely appreciate the latter.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Hazel

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive bar set. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed and even surprised with the high qualify. I guess the low price made me expect less. Had two of those bar sets before and this one is on a different league. The shaker does its job with no effort and no leaks, the Jiggers have multi capacities (with markings), the mojito muddler has a silicone had and teeth which makes very sanitary and safe, the corkscrew is very high quality, sturdy and elegant (the logo is beautiful and not too loud). Super cool tube box. Great as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, high-quality bartender kit
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, high-quality bartender kit. Has everything you need to start mixing great drinks. Even better, however, was the exceptional customer service from Mixology&Craft. They made sure I was completely satisfied with their product. I couldn't be happier with the kit and the company. The kit may be a few bucks more than some cheaper products, but it (and the customer service) is WAY worth it.
customer_reviews.author: stufam

customer_reviews.title: Great looking Bartending Set, very well made
customer_reviews.text: I love this set, I spent hours comparing bartender sets and this one is a great value, looks great and is the most complete set I found at this price point. It is stainless steel and the only “problem” is I can’t seen to nest everything back into the cylinder as neatly as it was when I first got it.
customer_reviews.author: Mariuccia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and absolutely wonderful customer service! Would highly recommend this seller and product!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy B

customer_reviews.title: A great gift for the budding mixologist
customer_reviews.text: Received this a few days ago and have already used the kit three times. It actually arrived SOONER than estimated (1-day shipping promised Sat morning delivery, and it was outside our door Friday evening!). Very happy with the various components, and even more happy that they are all dishwasher-safe. I also like that everything fits neatly back into the canister, so it can tuck into the liquor cabinet instead of taking up counter space.
customer_reviews.author: JamieB

customer_reviews.title: Great product but....
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my gf, she loved it and has used it almost every day since receiving it. We make cocktails just about everynight. Good quality and worth the money. Only slightly negative thing I have to say is all the items do not fit in the can provided for storage. When it arrived to our door we had pieces in a seperate bag. But that's not a big deal, just a heads up for people expecting it to arrive nicely in just the storage can. Which some might arrive that way but ours did not. But anyways great product and happy to have this.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Company effort = attractive
customer_reviews.text: This item is better than expected. I love the high quality items. Definitely worth it. But more importantly is the effort that the company delivers on their product by providing notes on how to email support team and warranty options. I'm enjoying my new bar set. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: SupermanSlayer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, even better customer service
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for 3 weeks now and it has been great! It has everything you need to make quality cocktails at home and I feel like it is an excellent bartending set for beginners like myself. Furthermore, the customer service for this product has been incredible. It comes with a 3 year warranty and they are extremely responsive to their customers. One of my jiggers broke and they promptly sent me a new one the very next day. Overall, I'm very happy with this product and I highly recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Mehul Shah

customer_reviews.title: Great mixology bartender kit
customer_reviews.text: Great kit, I'm totally in love with it. The quality is great, it comes with everything you need, the price is great. This is the perfect kit for anyone that just wants to have it at home, it's a great gift. I contacted the seller and I'm happy to say that the customer service is amazing :) You won't regret buying this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set, highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: This set is a great product overall. All the tools are stainless steel and are very sturdy and very good quality, easy to clean and store, even the cylinder box it comes in is sturdy enough that you can take it on the go. It comes with all your essential tools and their functionality is on point. It even comes with a little cocktail recipe booklet which was what addition, especially if you're a beginner in mixology. The price is very reasonable and customer service was great too. Great job, Mixology and Craft! I'll definitely be buying from these guys again.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Ok I'm having fun with this
customer_reviews.text: Ok I'm having fun with this! It is a pretty sturdy product! It seems to clean well(13 uses). The lid(mixer) is a little hard to put on but it's sealed when done correctly! I think it's a really good product and I have it at a 4.6. For a party/ beginners bartenders kit I think it's probably one of the best one's offered but I've only seen two others which felt plastic at best. If you not a serious hardcore bartender I think you will like this!
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Quality Cocktail Set Good For Beginners
customer_reviews.text: The set arrived in a neatly packaged cylinder. I unwrapped all the contents and had my first cocktail made within the hour! The shaker is very sturdy and elegantly designed. All of the tools are are quality craftsmanship. Having two double-sided jiggers covers all your bases so you don’t even have to eyeball it. Very complete set for an unbeatable price!
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Great way to make drinks
customer_reviews.text: Great bartending kit. Very easy to clean. Love how the cocktail shaker top fits. The only thing I wish was different was that one of the joggers was 1/4 oz. But it doesnt take away from the product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jenah schlater

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift! Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been wanting to up his game when it came to drink making but could never find everything in one kit. Enter THIS kit!! It has EVERYTHING he wanted and needed to get started. The quality is awesome, it's easy to clean and the drink cards tell you how to make a proper drink as good as a bartender. Perfect for beginners and aficionados alike!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: You need this in your kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely AWESOME. All the pieces and options are fantastic Value is perfect LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter who is currently taking an online bartenders course. This product is perfect for what she needs and will be most useful for our home enjoyment also. The package arrived on the date it was promised however, the packaging was badly damaged and both the metal top and bottom caps are badly dented.
customer_reviews.author: lynnj

customer_reviews.title: Wrong shaker's cap size - they are sending a new one
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this package and the shaker (the main product) is defective, the cap is too small for the body. However, they are in the process of sending me a entire new kit, So far, great service. Once I receive the package again, I will come back and rewrite this review.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Lara

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little bartender set with drink cards that help you make the traditional bar drinks. Great for guests who need a list of what you can make. Set it great well made and goes back in the container for easy storage. Everything you need for a home bar and very giftable!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole L Pruett

customer_reviews.title: Quality product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I feel like the kit has all you need to become a home bartender. Super fun and easy to use. Great quality too. My jigger was defective when it was first sent, it basically separated after I washed it the first time I used it. However, they sent me an immediate replacement. Customer service was super easy to get a hold of and they're very attentive. 10/10 recommend this product and this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I must say that MixologyAndCraft bar tending tools and barware and of very good quality and rustproof as they are made of good ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this kit after doing much research and comparing different products. I must say that MixologyAndCraft bar tending tools and barware and of very good quality and rustproof as they are made of good quality stainless steel. I can now make amazing cocktails and I do really enjoy the experience making them with this kit. I am in love with the kit and would defiantly recommend buying this. Thanks for the suprise gift (star pin for garnish). I have put up a picture of the tasty whisky sour I made using this kit. Pls also check do check the instagram page @_drunkpanda_ for more cocktails made using this kit. Cheers!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just add alcohol....
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a gift and am extremely happy. Has everything possible needed to start your at-home mixologist career. All the items, except maybe the wine opener (comparing to the one I have already), feel very well made. And the engraving on certain items gives a really nice touch to the set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice appearance
customer_reviews.text: I originally wrote a review on this product and it was justified based on appearances. However the seller has made restitution on that order. I am changing my rating because of the replacement (upon showing proof of damage) and expedient delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Jean B

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, hit of the party!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mixer set, it has everything. We ordered it before a housewarming party and it was a big success. It came in quick, exactly as described and looks great in our bar. Thanks for delivering as advertised!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Josh... Just plain ol Josh.

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for faulty shaker
customer_reviews.text: The main piece never worked for me. The shaker never properly closed as the pieces never fit. Everything else in the kit was as described, just the shaker does not close and therefore useless.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product a while back and really enjoyed it, but after some time I noticed rust on two pieces of the set and reached out to the seller. They got back to me in a day and offered to send replacement pieces. They were very nice and have great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Dubbelde

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with my initial bartender kit and I was promptly contacted about my issue and was sent a new one at no cost that same day! Love my bartender kit! :) Thanks again! My previous review: Loved everything but the top to the shaker. It’s not easy to get off once it is cold and wet. The strainer is also hard to hold on to and kind of big compared to ones I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Meeks

customer_reviews.title: Everything seems to be great quality
customer_reviews.text: So far it appears to be a nice set, have not used it yet, plan to this weekend tho! Will update review if anything isn't good.
customer_reviews.author: Mustafa Abbas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Set!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my Mixology Set and it came beautifully packaged and everything was individually wrapped to protect the finish. I cant wait to try it out and mix up some of my favorite drinks, If your looking for a nice set to accent your home bar, this is the one. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need to make cocktails
customer_reviews.text: Came in a nice large tube, easy to clean. Product seems to be sturdy and easy to use. Could be a great gift to someone.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Heffelfinger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This bar kit is awesome! The stainless steel looks so clean and professional. The cocktail cards are really cute and helpful. The cylinder it comes in is neat especially if you were gifting it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and perfect for entertaining
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product to add to our bar/kitchen and we are enjoying it already! It has everything you need to make a great cocktail!
customer_reviews.author: Jaena Strong

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great tools. Cap on the cobbler shaker needs help staying on sometimes. I wish they sold more products, I’d keep buying.
customer_reviews.author: Ed S.

customer_reviews.title: Bartender kit is very complete. All of the pieces ...
customer_reviews.text: Bartender kit is very complete. All of the pieces fit into the cylinder keeping everything in one small place. I have a small bar area and having a compact place to keep all of the pieces is important.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Amazing deal
customer_reviews.text: great product and quality for such a good price! The seller was also amazing and followed up to ensure i was satisfied with my product
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I look legit making cocktails!
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to make a craft cocktail At home that would otherwise Be $15+ at a bar! I love entertainment with this kit, makes me look legit!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Franklin

customer_reviews.title: just starting? get this.
customer_reviews.text: I am not a professional bartender, but as a man that enjoys cocktails, this set was a perfect setup for my bar collection. I wish to learn and make various cocktails. This set is great for beginners. Professionals probably won't say no to it either.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Perry

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift for the cocktail crafter!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect, everything-you-need bartender tool set; full-on legit. I’m so impressed with the quality. The packaging is perfect for gift giving, but if it’s for you...hey, it’ll makes you feel special. The etching of the brand adds a touch of class. From the muddler to the garnish picks and everything in between, I’m thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Jay D.

customer_reviews.title: Best Value -  Best Bar Set!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a lot of the Bar Sets and this was a Great Value to set up our bar! Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Fonden

customer_reviews.title: Its arrives on time. Everything should be already in the container
customer_reviews.text: Well this was a gift to my boyfriend and he as a bartender loves it. It came all in the container holder it was shipped well. Nothing came broken or bend. All items was also secured in a plastic bag to make sure none scratches on each other. I would buy this product again. I was happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected. Wish it was made in the USA.
customer_reviews.text: This set is very sleek looking, easy to clean and works great! Recipe book it came with is really great too. I would buy it again as a gift for family & friends!
customer_reviews.author: SFK

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, just not pleased with performance of tools
customer_reviews.text: Comes with a lot of tools but most tools aren’t very comfortable to use. The wine key struggles to open a wine bottle
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, Quality Product.
customer_reviews.text: This is really a nice product. The quality is top-notch and exactly what I needed to outfit my bar. I think any budding mixologist would love to have this all-in-one set. The only item I am adding is a good pyrex graduated measuring cup for adding those juices and such for a perfect mix.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Gift with just one issue!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this set was perfect except the shaker! It seems from the reviews other people had some issues as well but the lid barely fit on the shaker and need excessive force to get it on or off. Also the shaker doesn’t fit over a typical pint glass. Other than these issues, I love this set and it was the perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great set!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing set. Great quality and for the price you can't go wrong. Seller stands behind his product as well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Romero

customer_reviews.title: Shaker doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: The lid does not fit over the shaker vessel. They are the same size. Did i get a bad unit?
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: comes with everything you could need. perfect gift. stores complete in the metal tin. great quality
customer_reviews.author: donovan brink

customer_reviews.title: Bad customer service not trying to help the customer with his needs
customer_reviews.text: Disliked everything, container was ok, but inside everything looked like it was used, renewed, measuring cup looked like it had mold, ice grabber was scratched and/or dented, none of the pieces were usable or looked new.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit for bartenders who do private party or at home use.
customer_reviews.author: Litia Benton

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: First of all I want to thank this amazing seller! I bought this bartender kit as a gift and it came batter than in a photo and description. We was amazed of the quality of the product. You just have everything you need to tend a bar! Thanks a lot! Very recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Anna vdo

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed. Doesn't leak and makes great drinks. The quality is very nice, I was not expecting the stainless to have such heft and quality. I loved the included drink recipes. Full disclaimer: might be drinking now
customer_reviews.author: Becca D

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday present for my son. He was delighted with it. Everything was sturdy and well made of a good quality metal and the design of the articles was quite attractive
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Cox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality crafted and packaged mixology tools. Will become a master mixologist with this product. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use and have
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used it a few times but I definitely love it! It makes me feel like a real bartender when I am making drinks at home.
customer_reviews.author: dwessel69

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for an old fashioned or martini drinker
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband, and it’s his most used gift so far! Simple tools that make mixology fun and easy
customer_reviews.author: LRB

customer_reviews.title: Great tools and fantastic service
customer_reviews.text: All of the tools function exactly as expected and it has been fun making new cocktails. The Shaker top didn't fit quite right but Mixology&Craft immediately sent a new one when I emailed them. It's a great deal for everything included!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set for the price point. Would make a great addition to and home bar. Quality is good. Ease of use is good. The stainless is very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Josh M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set
customer_reviews.text: This set works exactly as advertised. Everything arrived intact and nicely packaged. Good quality SS. I searched for a long time for a good bar set and I'm very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: Very Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with no problems at all! Definitely worth the buy. My guests loved it and the mojitos I was making all night! It seems like actual food grade stainless too, not that cheap stainless that rusts 12hrs in.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan C.

customer_reviews.title: great set for cocktails
customer_reviews.text: It's really a great set! I got this a month ago and use it every weekend to entertain friends with new cocktails. I enjoy the easy use and care as it is so easy to wash. I was even more surprised to get the extended life time warranty. thanks Mixology and Craft... Looking forward for this weekend:) In the pictures: opening the box...... second picture my first mochito..... I'm so proud
customer_reviews.author: nate

customer_reviews.title: Great kit to mix your drinks
customer_reviews.text: This kit is great, has everything you need to start your own bar at home. It makes for an awesome gift as well.
customer_reviews.author: Max Cavalera

customer_reviews.title: Good for travel purposes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the travel case it comes with so I can easily store it for the beach and the product fantastic! Just remember how everything came in the box so you can put everything away easier!
customer_reviews.author: hunter miller

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Quality components through and through
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Quality components through and through. Just as advertised. Any concerns are addressed personally by the owner, Yuval Ravi’s. That’s service you can count on. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick M. Seifried

customer_reviews.title: Party in a can
customer_reviews.text: Great set realy has everything you need to mix all you cocktail chooses.
customer_reviews.author: Hahaha

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: this is fantastic. it contains all of the items I have been looking for. I just started my bar set. you can say I am new to this. but this kit has really got me going in the right direction. Thanks to the folks at Mixology& craft.
customer_reviews.author: mzac

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this mixology bartender kit! Heavy and durable yet sleek and stylish! Have already received compliments on the set!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Prather

customer_reviews.title: Nice product just one issue
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. However the lid doesn’t come off when you shake it and the strainer in the lid doesn’t come off at all. But it looks nice and it works if you don’t need ice.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen callahan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. haven't used it much yet. Ive seen people comment about leaks or misfits on the shaker, thats unfortunate. Mine was perfect out of the box. Super fun making drinks and experimenting. I bought a soda stream to make tonic water. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: omar

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves making mixed drinks so I surprised him with this. He’s obsessed and keeps running to the store to buy more ingredients for drinks!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Ritsick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This product is really good you can litterally make any drink you want with this set your only limit is your imagination and they also give you a booklet of classic cocktails too.
customer_reviews.author: adam tarver

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Purchased to use on a bar cart we made. It's just as described and we are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: PENNY B

customer_reviews.title: Dope set
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews and I hate writing I am simply writing this quick one cuz I actually love this set. Also it came in literally one day and it has a 3 year warranty and it was cheaper than some of the other ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Produced by people with sense of design, every piece was good.
customer_reviews.author: Mohsen

customer_reviews.title: Great value and has everything you would need.  Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: This would be a great gift item and has a nice reusable package!
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve drop the damn thing so many times after getting hammered making the awesome drinks the show you. Cup is still in good condition. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: angel mejia

customer_reviews.title: Shaker won't fit a pint glass
customer_reviews.text: So I got everything it was nicely packaged and neat but my biggest complaint is the shaker doesn't fit over a pint glass, and it's so close that it's actually frustrating so you HAVE to use the top that's my biggest complaint about the whole set.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Killer
customer_reviews.text: Super clean set, everything you need to make a delicious cocktail. Appreciate the helpful, friendly customer service too. Always love supporting small businesses
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Crafton

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for sons birthday and my husband enjoyed it very much. All the components were perfect for mixing drinks and we enjoyed it very much. It's a great kit to start your home bar.
customer_reviews.author: lucinda esparza

customer_reviews.title: All in one bar toolbox
customer_reviews.text: Just got a bar in my house and this is the perfect starter kit! Everything you need for a premium cocktail. It also came with a cute little cocktail recipe booklet.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Rust despite good care
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my fiancé and we just pulled it out to mix drinks two months ago. We wash it and dry it right, and after 5 uses there already appears to be rust forming in the mixer. Isn’t it suppose to be stainless steel? We had high hopes but are not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Christina W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got this kit for my husband and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: SumWunIsHere

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it !!! I feel like a real bartender!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie soto

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Got it as a gift for someone and they loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Love but....
customer_reviews.text: Love the set! My shaker is not the correct size for my pint glasses. Huge bummer. Would be perfect if this was corrected!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanna Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. Shaker didn’t stick together and it didn’t leak. I appreciate the additional pieces that the set comes with.

customer_reviews.title: Quality

product_meta.title: Mixology Bartender Kit: 14-Piece Cocktail Shaker Set - Bar Tool Set For Home and Professional Bartending - Martini Shaker Set with Drink Mixing Bar Tools - Exclusive Cocktail Picks and Recipes Bonus
feature_bullets: ✓ EVERYTHING YOU NEED (EXCEPT FOR THE BOOZE) » 14-Piece ALL-INCLUSIVE Bar Set of top shelf bar accessories. Will give you the power to whip up impressive cocktails for your guests. Whether you're an amateur bartender or a cocktail mixing guru, whether you’re setting up a bar at home or at work - Our bartender kit is a brilliant way to hit the ground running.

✓ CREATE EXCEPTIONAL COCKTAILS WITH EMBARRASSING EASE » using the leak-proof, 24 oz bar mixer (make up to 3 drinks at once). Construct your cocktail set with the best bar tools, used in the world’s top cocktail bars and bartending competitions.

✓ UNDENIABLY THE PERFECT GIFT FOR COCKTAIL LOVERS » First-class bartending kit packed inside a durable, handsome cylindrical case. Your recipient will be thrilled like a child in a candy store. Plus, to make things truly delicious, we’ll throw in an online cocktail catalog, and two professional cocktail picks to add a fun, visual element to your drinks - and to guarantee a knockout presentation.

✓ SOLID AND DURABLE: » Heavy-duty and high-grade, stainless steel mixology kit. Unlike similar barware sets who rust easily, this entire cocktail kit is made of stainless steel alloy: SS304 & SS430. Worry not. it’s all dishwasher compatible, so forget about wear and tear with this bartender set.
